sum_bart: The Board of Directors of Hindustan Unilever Limited will meet on 24th April to consider the Audited and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2015. The notice of meeting will be published in the following newspapers: Business Standard, All Editions in English and Navshakti, Marathi.
sum_peg: Dear Sir,ursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we hereby enclose copies of the notice of meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company scheduled to be held on Thursday , 24th April , 202 5 inter alia, to consider the Audited and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March , 202 5.
